titleStmt.title: Madrigalls to foure voyces newly published by Iohn Bennet his first works
Madrigals
titleStmt.author: Bennet, John, fl. 1599-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in little Saint Hellens by [H. Ballard for] William Barley, the assigne of Thomas Morley. Cum priuilegio,

notesStmt.note: Four partbooks, each with separate dated title page and register. At foot of title, part 1: "Cantus"; part 2: "Altus"; part 3: "Tenor"; part 4: "Bassus".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
